hackathon-description-text: Serverless is it. It allows you to focus on building and running applications without worrying about managing servers, as server provisioning and maintenance are all taken care of behind the scenes.
hackathon-requirements:
Build a killer serverless app with nuclio on k8s.
Judges must be able to bring up and operate the solution from scratch (scratch = a clean Kubernetes cluster with nuclio installed on it). 
The submission must include:

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Demonstrating an application that benefits from a very fast / light weight serverless framework
Addressing interesting conceptual issues such as processing high volumes of data and machine or deep learning
